mainText:
Promo:Bank of Entitlement - Where your sense of entitlement is our top priority! Join us today and start reaping the rewards you deserve.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into a coffee shop, ready to order my usual venti, sugar-free, vanilla latte with almond milk, extra hot. The barista, clearly a newbie, has the audacity to ask me, "What size?" Can you believe it? My outrage meter hits the roof! I immediately demand to see the manager, who, upon my insistence, offers me a free month of lattes as compensation for the inconvenience. Ah, the sweet taste of entitlement victory!
